meanings.definition: The state of being exultant or joyful.
meanings.sent1: Her face showed pure exultancies when she received the award.
meanings.sent2: The exultancies of winning the game were evident on their faces.
meanings.sent3: The exultancies of the puppy playing with its new toy were contagious.
meanings.sent4: The exultancies of nature after a rainstorm are truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The exultancies of a child on their birthday are priceless.

meanings.definition: Feelings of great happiness or triumph.
meanings.sent1: Their exultancies at the news were overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The exultancies of the crowd echoed through the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The exultancies of finding a lost treasure were unmatched.
meanings.sent4: The exultancies of a successful mission filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The exultancies of a graduation day are unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The exultancies of the parade could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent2: Their exultancies filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent3: The exultancies of the party lasted long into the night.
meanings.sent4: The exultancies of the victory march were infectious.
meanings.sent5: The exultancies of a wedding are always heartwarming.
